  "approach": "Update ShowHideMenuItems() and sub-methods to call GetSelectedNodes() and aggregate state across all selected nodes (enable Connect if any disconnected, enable Disconnect if any has OpenConnections > 0), rather than branching solely on single SelectedNode; execution paths already iterate GetSelectedNodes() so no changes needed there."
